titleStmt.title: The king's authority in dispensing with ecclesiastical laws, asserted and vindicated by the late Reverend Philip Nye ...
Lawfulnes of the oath of supremacy and power of the King in ecclesiastical affairs
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.N. and Nathanael Ranew ...,

notesStmt.note: Published by the author's son, Henry Nye.
Published in 1683 under title: The lawfulnes of the oath of supremacy and power of the king in ecclesiastical affairs.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
